channel.title: What I've been working on
channel.description:
The shitty fps is due to the fact that this program is using[size=2] [font=Verdana]Real time lighting calculations (the calculations have not been optimized yet).[/font][/size]
I have done texture mapping, gouraud shading on the texture mapped triangles, light source managing, transformation matrices, triangle rasterization, custom font loading / drawing from a bitmap image, a basic game engine layout.
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/5m0eht.png[/img]

item.title: What I've been working on
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Bowser jr:

There’s something about the first version made me like that better.

Yeah I know, I liked it too. I have a backup of that version. The shading on the first version looked very tiki imo, but I had to do it correctly to satisfy my need to say I’ve done gouraud shading. Also I prefer correct gouraud shading for my game.
Thank you for your opinion though!

EDIT: Would anyone like me to post a tutorial on basic wireframe 3D graphics in java?

Read full topic

item.title: What I've been working on
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Eyeownyew, post:6, topic:551647”]Alright that looks far better, it was probably just the shading
Antialiasing should probably be on the list somewhere, looking good though[/quote]
Yeah I was calculating all of the intensities correctly but I found out that my scanline drawing method was not doing what it was supposed to do.

Read full topic

item.title: What I've been working on
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“Limits, post:3, topic:551647”][quote author=Eyeownyew link=topic=670563.msg4483846#msg4483846 date=1432518149]
It seems like a cool project but the visuals (ESPECIALLY the font) look atrocious
[/quote]
hehehe yeah the font was made by me as fast as I could do it, i’ll definitely fix it up. What other visuals look atrocious? I know that the shading is not smooth looking at all either.[/quote]Would shading repair that pixelated and sharpness of edges?

Read full topic
